description: Click to organize all nodes by their order_tag. Background columns appear showing the organization structure.
Click to return nodes to their natural messy order. Background columns disappear.
Click to transform all colors to their pretty_color values. Background, fonts, and nodes become prettier.
Click to return all colors to their initial color values. Everything goes back to the original color scheme.
Click to transform all node circles into ðŸ‘€ emoji. All nodes become eyes watching you work.
Click to transform all ðŸ‘€ emoji back into colored circles. Nodes return to their original shape.
Click to make all nodes fully visible (100% opacity). Everything becomes clear and readable.
Click to reduce all nodes back to 70% opacity. Maintains a subtle, less prominent view.
Click to recolor all nodes with 'done' tag to #03BA6D. Shows completed items in green.
Click to restore original colors for all nodes. Returns 'done' nodes to their initial colors.
Click to play fullscreen video. Press ESC to return to the mapping.
Click to play fullscreen video. Press ESC to return to the mapping.
Click to transform all node circles into ðŸ’˜ emoji. All nodes become eyes watching you work. And the node itself transforms into ðŸ«
